name: certificate-verification-system
description: Student Certificate Verification System - Microservices Architecture

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:university" "npm run dev:certificate" "npm run dev:verification"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: concurrently "cd backend/auth-service && npm run build" "cd backend/university-service && npm run build" "cd backend/certificate-service && npm run build" "cd backend/verification-service && npm run build"
scripts.build:frontend: concurrently "cd frontend/admin-dashboard && npm run build" "cd frontend/student-portal && npm run build" "cd frontend/employer-portal && npm run build"
scripts.test:backend: concurrently "cd backend/auth-service && npm test" "cd backend/university-service && npm test" "cd backend/certificate-service && npm test" "cd backend/verification-service && npm test"
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: concurrently "cd backend/auth-service && npm install" "cd backend/university-service && npm install" "cd backend/certificate-service && npm install" "cd backend/verification-service && npm install"
scripts.setup:frontend: concurrently "cd frontend/admin-dashboard && npm install" "cd frontend/student-portal && npm install" "cd frontend/employer-portal && npm install"
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate:auth && npm run migrate:university && npm run migrate:certificate
scripts.seed: npm run seed:auth && npm run seed:university && npm run seed:certificate
